resources.string: This shows the current Price in Market at your nearby Location.

The User needs to upload their daily productions in this category You need to select the crops, followed by the Quality and then the user need to add the quantity of the crops. After Adding of Quantity the Price Range will be shown.
This option gives the detailed information about the previous products being sold by the users.
This option makes the Farmer to cancel the unwanted crop added to cart accidently.
This option helps the users to track the status of their product. It shows three stages starting from the Collection followed by Transportation and ends with the Payment option.
The current Status and the other important Information will be notified through Notifications
The Users can able to add their Feedbacks, queries and Necessities through the Feedback option.
The Userâ€™s profile will be available here. The user can able to edit his Basic personal details and Land details through this option
In case, if the users need any help or guidance they can use this option. Through this the users can directly able to contact the app officials
The daily availability of crops and their prices will be displayed Retailers can able to select the product based on their requirement The selected crops will be added to their cart
This option gives the detailed information about the previous products transactions of the user. This option helps the user to cancel the unwanted crop added to cart accidently.
This option helps the users to track the Status of their product. It shows three stages starting from the Collection followed by Transportation and ends with the Payment option
It Shows the Debit Card Details and Credit Card Details and it displayed the history of Transactions
